A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't understand the hate from the audience. This was pretty much exactly what I expected and was hoping for. Felt like Star Wars yet did new things. Best acting yet in a star wars film top to bottom. Kept the mythology intact while adding new elements to it that keep in line with already established cannon. Bonus points for Laura Dern. Easily up there for me personally with Empire and New Hope.
